1.content:
Height: 5'6

“I'm sorry Mr Green...but I we do not have the knowledge of knowing as to why your height lost. I mean its pretty common for a person to lose an inch or two every twenty years but this...” said Cyndie Jones as she was going through her records.

“What are you saying?” asked Neil Green as he looked at his doctor. Cyndie put the records down and answered, “What I'm saying is you have caught a very rare illness. Its so rare that there's hardly any word of it in the medical books”

“Well what is it? What have I caught?” asked Neil as he was getting scared. “Well Mr Green, you've caught a very rare illness which according to the only few people to ever got it is known as Shrinkage Disease” answered Cyndie.

“Shrinkage Disease...what does that do?” asked Neil. “Well...its does what it sounds...the illness you got is causing your body to slowly shrink away” answered Cyndie. “Tell me that you're joking” said Neil. “If you don't believe me, wait in a couple of days, then we see” said Cyndie.

“Fine, fine...what are my options?” asked Neil as he looked at the floor. “Well, since not many people have ever caught Shrinkage Disease so it best that you should remain within this hospital. You will be housed within the special ward till we can get any results” answered Cyndie.

“That sounds as if I got to stay here, is there isn't any other options?” asked Neil as he looked at her. “Would you rather be at home doing your normal things, slowly shrinking? The people will notice a shrinking man and trust me when I say this. You don't want that kind of limelight” answered Cyndie.

“Fine...when I am going to this ward?” asked Neil as he stood up. “We can send you to it right now if you wish, the sooner the better as we can find a cure faster that way” answered Cyndie as she stood up and walked next to Neil. Cyndie was a inch taller than Neil as she's 5'7 where Neil was once 5'10.

Cyndie led Neil down the hallway to entrance to building. “So just where is this ward anyway?” asked Neil as Cyndie walked up to his car. “Don't worry about the address, I send someone to pick you up within a hour to drop you off at the hospital” answered Cyndie.

“See you later then” said Neil as he drove off home packing a few of his things together. As he was packing, there was a knock on the door. Neil walked to the front door and opened it, there standing by the entrance as a 5'9 woman with long blond hair and light blue eyes smiling at him.

“Erm yes can I help you?” asked Neil as he was taken back by the tall beauty standing before him. “Hi Neil Green, I'm Melanie Dickson. I'm here to take you in” answered the woman. “Take me in? Oh you mean the ward right?” asked Neil. “Correct Mr Green. Please, if you're ready packed, shall we go” answered Melanie.

Neil zipped up his trunk filled with things he want and carried it to Melanie's car. With that, Neil took one last look at his house as he knew that when he was to return, the house will look different. The drive took about an hour long, Melanie parked her car in the car park, got out and waited to Neil to get out.

Once out, he looked out at the building that he would be spending in for a long while. He looked at the sign building and saw that it read, St. Mercy Hospital. With that the two of them headed inside the hospital.
1.title: Day 0

11.content:
Height: 5'5

A day has past since Neil moved into the hospital,

“Now then Mr Green, you are to be staying here in this ward till Doctor Jones can find a cure” said Melanie as she was walking left to right as Neil was sitting on his bed. “I gather that” said Neil as he looked at her walking.

“Now then, Mr Green, you are free to wonder around ward but please don't not leave this ward as you do not want the illness you are in to be made know. Can I trust you with that task” said Melanie as she stopped walking and put her hands on her hips in front of him. “Of course” said Neil.

“Good, now then, last thing, I will be your nurse for the time you are to be here so, if things are to become hard as I know it will in the near future I will be here to help you with anything you need” said Melanie.

“You're my nurse, okay then. So what is there for a shrinking guy like myself can do around here?” asked Neil as he laid back on his bed. “For the time being, you are to watch television till Doctor Jones arrive” answered Melanie as she left the room.

Neil turned on the television that was in the room for half an hour as Cyndie enters the room. “Ah hello Mr Green, how are things today?” asked Cyndie as she looked at him as Neil sat up.

“Well I'm a man that's getting smaller, how would I meant to feel about that?” answered Neil as he looked at her. “Okay, okay...silly question to ask really. Anyway, today we need to take some blood samples along with some tests to that we can understand what we are dealing with here” said Cyndie as she smiled at him.

“Fine then, when do we start?” asked Neil as he stood up and looked at the even more taller doctor. “We start right away, now strip off your clothes and get into bed” answered Cyndie as she exit the room. Neil followed what she told him and put on a hospital gown and climbed onto the bed.

A minute later,

Cyndie came back with Melanie in uniform into the room. “Come on then” said Cyndie as Melanie took the locks off the bed wheels and pushed the bed into another room to perform tests.

After a few blood samples and tests, left Neil very tired as he pretty much fell asleep when he returned back to his room. As he was asleep, he slowly shrank down another inch.

1111.content:
Height: 5'6

Nicole flies into the room her hair tossed in the air as she was nearly running across the room. "Are you ok!" She yelled out tossing her arms over Neil's shoulders hugging him tightly against herself. In the first moments Neil was a bit stunned after all this was the first time he'd seen her since the shrinking started and even having only lost a few inches so far the difference was more then noticeable or it might of been that he was simply struggling to breath under her tight grip! When Nicole finally broke her grip letting herself fall back onto the flats of her feet Neil was about to get a good look at her.

Nicole was in a tight fitting button up red top it would seem she was thinking about him having lovely left the top few buttons undone giving Neil a lovely view of his girlfriends warm smooth chest as it softly pushed against the fabric of both her top and her bra that only barely lay hidden under a thin layer of red fabric. Her hair was loose as usual small tight curls bouncing at the ends of her wavy brown hair lightly brushing against her skin. She had on a simple pair of jean shorts with a belt that was slightly over sized which she had most likely stolen from him to make her outfit look cute, it worked. He wasn't able to see her feet, but from the sound they had made from her coming in Neil could hazard a guess that she was wearing her favorite light red flip flops that she took nearly everywhere with her.

"Are you ok?" She asked again bringing Neil back to reality, he grinned shaking his head. "Yeah I'm fine hun, the doctors here seem to really be ontop of things. They are working night and day looking for a way of curing me of this.... condition I guess I'll call it." Nicole frowned a bit the worry evident on her face. "How bad is it thought your.... condition. I mean I understand the basics I guess. How much has it done so far?" Neil smiled looking over himself. "Well last I checked I was down to 5'6 so I've lost about 6 inches. So nothing life ending, but I will need to buy some new cloths my old ones would hang a bit at this point." Nicole smiled a bit even though she has a tear in her eye.

"Stop that, we shouldn't be laughing about this. I mean what if it doesn't stop? How much smaller can you get?" Neil shrugged, "Honestly I don't think anyone really knows. I mean I trust the doctors, but it seems they don't even know how often I'll shrink much less how much I will before I stop without a cure. At the moment I just want keep positive about this. So how about it? Will you be strong with me Nicole..." He got silent for a moment. "I'm not sure I can really take all this without you." Nicole bit her lower lip before taking a bit of a breath. She leaned over hugging him once more. "Of course baby. I'll be here no matter what happens. I'd never give up on you or us." She said before kissing Neil.

"I love you." She says softly. "Love you to." Neil says back as they hold each other the soft sounds of medical equipment filling the silence of the room.

Height 5'3

Neil looked at the clock there was still hours of daylight left and he wasn't exactly tired. He didn't know how long he would be in this place so he figured he might as well see what was here. He might even make a friend or two during his stay, you never knew after all. He hopped down off the bed which was a strange feeling since he'd hadn't had to do something like that since he was a kid. It would seem his condition was still doing its work and all he could hope was that it would eventually start to slow down a bit other wise he would be using a match box to sleep in by the end of the week.

Neil made his way through the halls which he found for the most part to be rather empty. It would seem this ward was only for special cases so he saw few patients or even medical staff. He was heading to the recreation room when he felt two powerful hands push him making him stumble and finally tumble down onto the ground. "What the hell is the big deal!" He yelled out annoyed as he started to hear the laughter of a young girl. As he filled himself around he found himself looking up at a teenager dressed in a pair of light blue cotton full body pajamas. Her long black hair came down to the middle of her shoulder blades a small pink hair click lay nestled in the top side of her head. Neil couldn't help, but let his eyes slowly make their way up her body, she was rather cute girl and she was even taller then he was even though she couldn't be taller then 5'6 which shocked him a bit.

She had her hands on her hips looking down at Neil frowning ever so slightly. "What are you looking at kid?" Neil's face went red from both anger and embarrassment. "What about you, what are you staring at?" She shrugged talking over to Neil before kneeling down over him a bit. "Just the new kid in the ward. I wanted to see if he was hot. Though you are a bit young for me if you were a few years older you might of been good dating material." "What!? Me to young? What about you? I'm twenty three years old what are you fourteen?"

The girl stood back up flipping her hair. "I'm fifteen thank you very much and aren't you a little short for your age kid?" "I have a illness I wasn't born this small." "Illness?" She looked confused for a second before offering a hand. "What does it do?" She seemed rather interested in the whole situation helping Neil back to his feet. He explained the whole situation he was in losing inches here and there through out the day, how he wasn't even sure how it happened, how no one know if it would even stop, and how they were looking for a cure. "So it isn't contagious or anything is it?" "No I don't think so." The girl breathed a sigh of relief. "Well thats good, I don't need anymore problems on my own plate." Neil hadn't even asked why she was in this ward, "So wha..." She cut him off shoving her hand in his face. "I'm Scarlet its nice to meet you and welcome to Vector Ward. It can be a bit strange here at first, but I'll help you out kid."

Neil took her hand shaking it. "Thanks Scarlet, I'm Neil and can you not call me kid?" She shook her head. "No way its not often I see someone smaller then me in here. So I'm going to enjoy this, sorry kid the nickname stays." Neil shakes his head, but excepted it. At least he wouldn't be spending all his time alone in here though he wasn't sure if Scarlet was much better.
